content: while learning to crochet i was always searching for free patterns that i could practice with and still make something i wanted i wrote this pattern with that in mind a free pattern that incorporates the most basic shapes of amigurumi that can be made by novice and expert alike materials required 3mm hook exact hook size isn t important as long as the stitches are tight ​ ​ worsted weight yarn tapestry needle for sewing marbles/rocks/etc for added weight optional 12mm - 15mm safety eyes 8mm safety nose optional doll stuffing us terminology used mc - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet increase - 2 single_crochet in the same st decrease - decrease we will work in rounds mark the beginning of each round with a stitch marker or yarn itty little kitty 1 head and body
